item.title: PCA in a tidy(verse) framework
item.description: Introduction The other day, a question was posted on RStudio Community about performing Principle Component Analysis (PCA) in a tidyverse workflow. Conveniently, I had literally just worked through this process the day before and was able to post an answer. While most questions and answers are good as they are on forum sites, I thought this one might be worth exploring a little more since using the tidyverse framework makes PCA much easier, in my opinion.
